amendatorysection.catchline: Tax Equalization and Review Commission Cash Fund; created; use; investment.
amendatorysection.para: The Tax Equalization and Review Commission Cash Fund is hereby created. All money received by the commission for appeals and services performed and billed to other agencies or persons shall be credited to the fund. The commission shall only bill for the actual amount expended in performing services. The fund shall be used to carry out the provisions of the Tax Equalization and Review Commission Act, except that transfers may be made from the fund to the General Fund at the direction of the Legislature. Expenditures from the Tax Equalization and Review Commission Cash Fund shall be made only when such funds are available. Any unexpended balance in the fund at the end of each fiscal year shall not lapse to the General Fund. Any money in the Tax Equalization and Review Commission Cash Fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.
